EmailTemplate.name: External Newsletter.2018-09-06
EmailTemplate.subject: Why is Pivotal's Dojo So Good?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
September, 6, 2018 <https://blog.usejournal.com/why-is-pivotals-dojo-so-good-c96cdb497ddf> Why is Pivotal's Dojo So Good? Lakshman Diwaakar, Cloud Architect at Renault-Nissan-Mitsubishi breaks down his experience with the Pivotal Dojo and explains what exactly makes it so good. Check it Out <[[https://blog.usejournal.com/why-is-pivotals-dojo-so-good-c96cdb497ddf]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/starting-with-end-end-customer-journey-is-there-a-better-way?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> Why Starting With End-to-End Customer Journeys Isn't Good For The Customer Amjad Sidqi, Associate Director at Pivotal Labs Sydney, explains why you shouldn't use end-to-end customer journeys to define product development initiatives. Learn More <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/starting-with-end-end-customer-journey-is-there-a-better-way?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/blog/this-month-in-spring-september-6-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> This Month in Spring Josh Long gives the monthly roundup on the latest and greatest in the world of Spring. Check it Out <[[https://content.pivotal.io/blog/this-month-in-spring-september-6-2018?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter> How Pivotal Cloud Foundry Can Transform Your Business Learn about the transformational impact of Pivotal Cloud Foundry when supporting your organization's business initiatives in this Forrester report. Read the Report <[[https://content.pivotal.io/analyst-reports/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/serverless-knative-project-riff-with-mark-fisher-ep-112?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Serverless, Knative, and Project riff, with Mark Fisher (Ep. 112) In this episode of Pivotal Conversations, Mark Fisher joins Richard and Coté to discuss riff, Knative, and serverless in general. Listen In <[[https://content.pivotal.io/podcasts/serverless-knative-project-riff-with-mark-fisher-ep-112?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Cloud-Native Security In the cloud-native era, security needs to be reimagined. Learn how cloud-native security transforms how you protect and mitigate risk. Reduce Risk in the Enterprise <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native-security?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-practices-application-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Pivotal Practices: Application Transformation Learn how your legacy portfolio can be gradually transformed to cloud-native in order to incrementally reduce time, cost, and operational inefficiencies while maintaining security, resilience, and compliance. Take a Closer Look <[[https://content.pivotal.io/white-papers/pivotal-practices-application-transformation?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]> Upcoming Events 9/11-9/14, Core Spring Training Session, Online <[[https://academy.pivotal.io/confirm-course?courseid=EDU-1094?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
9/19 Event-Driven Architecture Traps, Webinar <[[https://content.pivotal.io/webinars/sep-19-event-driven-architecture-traps-webinar?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
9/24-9/27, SpringOne Platform 2018, Washington D.C. <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-newsletter&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=external-newsletter]]>
